note:
"Life is Art!"
Try shouting that in the Big Market on a Saturday night
I am an English European, from the West Country, now living in Wales. I have been an independent graphic designer, art director and photographer since training in Newcastle-upon-Tyne and Brighton back in the seventies. As far as I'm concerned life is an art, but not necessarily Art, and everything that we do is an expression of that.

name: “Life is Art!”
